text: Hagi amanage hunka zamasamio, Ra Anumzana Agra Anumzamo'a amanage hie, Nagra kasefa hu'na mani'noa Anumzamo'na huankino, tamage huno Israeli mopafima havizama hu'nea kumatmimpima nemaniza vahera bainati kazinteti zamahe frigahaze. Hagi kumamofo megi'ama vanoma hanaza vahera, afi zagagafamo'za zamahe'za nesanageno, hankave vihufine havegampinema frakiza manisaza vahera krimo zamahe frigahie.
